channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oxygen discovered in most distant known galaxy
item.description: Astronomers have detected oxygen in the most distant known galaxy, JADES-GS-z14-0. This record-breaking detection is making astronomers rethink how qu...

item.title: Anti-amyloid drug shows signs of preventing Alzheimer's dementia

item.title: From dinosaurs to birds: the origins of feather formation

item.title: Science behind 'Polly want a cracker' could guide future treatment design for speech disorders
item.description: A new study explains how a parakeet's brain helps it to mimic human words.
